mapper.insert: insert into Users(User_no, LoginID, Password, NameHan, NameEng, Gender, StudResNum, HomePage, Email, FamilyAddress, PostNum, Address, Telephone, Cellphone, Language, MillArm, MillRank, MillEnrollDate, MillDischargeDate, MillIncompletReason, LearningContent, Thesis, ConsultContent, BirthDate) values (#{user_no}, #{loginID}, #{password}, #{nameHan}, #{nameEng}, #{gender}, #{studResNum}, #{homePage}, #{email}, #{familyAddress}, #{postNum}, #{address}, #{telephone}, #{cellphone}, #{language}, #{millArm}, #{millRank}, #{millEnrollDate}, #{millDischargeDate}, #{millIncompletReason}, #{learningContent}, #{thesis}, #{consultContent}, #{birthDate})
